itunes:title: #28: 3 Things to Keep in Mind When Making A Mistake
title: #28: 3 Things to Keep in Mind When Making A Mistake
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Oof!! Have you ever messed  up and battled with shame on how it made you look, what it meant about you, and if you could ever recover? If so, this episode is for you. Join us as Shena talks about 3 things for you to keep in mind whenever you make...
itunes:summary:
Oof!! Have you ever messed  up and battled with shame on how it made you look, what it meant about you, and if you could ever recover?

If so, this episode is for you. Join us as Shena talks about 3 things for you to keep in mind whenever you make a mistake. 

 

MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE
TheHealedandLovedWoman.com
